name: komga
description: Komga is a self hosted comics and manga server. It organizes libraries, tracks reading progress, supports multiple users and provides a responsive reader interface, similar to what Jellyfin or Plex offer for video.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted digital library for comics, manga, and graphic novels. Your personal comic server

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Built-in responsive reader with page-by-page and continuous scroll modes. Read on any device

features.title: Library Scanning
features.description: Automatic library scanning with series and collection detection. Organize comics effortlessly

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Fetch and edit metadata, covers, and series information. Maintain accurate library details

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Individual user accounts with separate reading progress and preferences. Share library with family
